name: Tukko Labs
tag_list: game-testing, usability-testing, scale-load-testing, alpha-testing, focus-group-testing, qa-testing, quality-assurance, stress-load-testing, community-management, player-liquidity, customer-support, social-games, mmogs, virtual-worlds, bug-testing, testin
overview:
Tukko Labs is a Quality Assurance laboratory dedicated to helping Social Game, MMOG, and Virtual World Developers enhance and polish their alpha and beta applications. Our testing team is a group of passionate gamers that have a long history of testing online games and applications. We have taken our experience and have developed specialized testing services that can help developers create a better user experience for their upcoming releases.

Services Include:

  • Alpha Testing / Early Game-play Feedback
  • Overall Usability
  • Stress and Load Testing
  • Player Liquidity
